name: supabase
author: fakebizprez
description: PostgreSQL and Supabase expertise for database design, schema architecture, and row-level security policies. Includes PostgreSQL table design best practices and Supabase RLS policy guidance.

skills.name: postgresql-table-design
skills.description: Design a PostgreSQL-specific schema. Covers best-practices, data types, indexing, constraints, performance patterns, and advanced features

skills.name: postgres-functions
skills.description: PostgreSQL functions and stored procedures. Expert guidance for creating, optimizing, and managing database functions with best practices.

skills.name: supabase-rls-policy
skills.description: Expert guidance for writing Supabase PostgreSQL row-level security (RLS) policies. Use when creating, modifying, or troubleshooting RLS policies for Supabase databases, implementing access control patterns, or setting up table-level security rules.

agents.name: postgres-expert
agents.description: PostgreSQL schema design expert for production-ready database architectures with best practices, data types, indexing, and performance patterns

agents.name: supabase-rls-expert
agents.description: Supabase RLS policy expert for production-ready row-level security implementation, access control patterns, and policy optimization
